channel.title: Moth LXXII - Azure Onyxscore [Orchestral, Piano, Mellow]
channel.description:
https://soundcloud.app.goo.gl/isHywuvdfYiftZDJ8
It is surprising how much you can alter how a song sounds by altering the pitch and tempo, it's use can help convey emotions. This track however, acts as a elegy for the recent death of a family member.
You're in a better place now, grandma. Rest in peace.
[Azure Onyxscore Summer 2021]
